June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     First there were Billing Periods - have you heard us mention Enrollment Periods     More recent discussions have been about enhancing Terms rather than creating a new entity that mimics some variation of year/term/subterm     After JAM the Product Development team will be meeting to continue work on these ideas  The Upcoming Year + More Term Flexibility © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.
